alert.note: Alert for West Central Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued May 04 at 3:01AM MDT until May 06 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM TODAY FOR PORTIONS OF WESTERN, CENTRAL AND EASTERN NM DUE TO STRONG WINDS, LOW HUMIDITY, AND AN UNSTABLE ATMOSPHERE... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM FRIDAY FOR MOST OF NEW MEXICO DUE TO STRONG WINDS, LOW HUMIDITY, AND AN UNSTABLE ATMOSPHERE... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT SATURDAY FOR MOST OF NORTHERN AND CENTRAL NM DUE TO STRONG WINDS, LOW HUMIDITY, AND AN UNSTABLE ATMOSPHERE... .Increasing southwest flow aloft will spread very dry air over the region today through Saturday. Strong southwest winds, very low humidity, warm temperatures, and an unstable airmass will lead to several hours of critical fire weather conditions across parts of the region in receptive fuels and below snowpack. In addition, lightning strikes from Tuesday and Wednesday may lead to new ignitions. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM MDT FRIDAY... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a Red Flag Warning...which is in effect from noon today to 8 PM MDT this evening. A Red Flag Warning has also been issued from noon to 8 PM MDT Friday. In addition...a Fire Weather Watch has been issued. This Fire Weather Watch is in effect from Saturday afternoon through Saturday evening. * AREA AND TIMING...West Central Mountains (Zone 105) from noon to 8 pm MDT today then again Friday and Saturday. * 20 FOOT WINDS...Southwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 40 mph today, Friday, and Saturday. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...10 to 15 percent today then 7 to 11 percent Friday and Saturday. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Red Flag Warning. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Fire Weather Watch.
